talk0000:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Greeting_01>Hello! My name is Nazbi.<sp:5:0:0> I'm a treasure
hunter and adventurer extraordinaire,
undaunted by even the coldest snow!
talk0020:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Greeting_01>Hey there! <sp:5:0:0>I'm Nazbi, the treasure hunter!<sp:5:0:0>
I'm searching these mountains for a
treasure based on a <clr:0000>legend <clr:ffff>I heard.
talk0030:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:TalkPositive>Once I get my hands on loads of treasure,
I'll spend it on a mountain of carrots!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801>Nothing but the best for my loyal
steed Dauntless!
talk0021:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:TalkPositive_01>Yeah! <sp:5:0:0>Like all the best legends, I'm sure
it's 100 percent true!<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:4:0>I feel like I told you this once before, but
it's fine! <sp:5:0:0>I'd talk about the legend of this
mountain all day if someone would let me!
talk0031:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseM_00>Huh? <sp:5:0:0>You found it?!<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:4:0>The spring high in the heavens was...<sp:5:0:0>in
the sky? <sp:5:0:0>You went through the rings of
light and a shrine appeared?!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01>How do I put this delicately...<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Happy_01>Way to go! <sp:5:0:0>That's amazing! <sp:5:0:0>As a kindred
spirit, I'm not upset at all that you found
the mountain's treasure. <sp:5:0:0>I'm proud!<sp:0:4:0>The treasure is yours, of course. No need
to split it with me!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Greeting_01>Because, you see...<sp:5:0:0>I'm Nazbi, the treasure
hunter who knows that the past is the
past. I look only to the future!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0101>That said, I think I'll stick around on this
mountain a while longer.<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:4:0>Finding one legendary treasure doesn't
rule out there being more to discover!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Happy_00>Till we meet again, <sp:5:0:0>my kindred spirit in
risking life and limb to chase legends!
talk0012:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>This area is frozen solid and packed
with monsters. No one in their right
mind would set foot here.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Happy_00>Except me, of course! <sp:5:0:0>There surely must
be treasure resting here on this mountain,
where everyone else fears to tread!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>That's what drove me to travel all this way
to Mount Lanayru.<sp:0:4:0>Until I saw you, I really thought I'd be the
only one.<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>You must be here for the same reasons
I am. <sp:5:0:0>And if you are, you'll be wanting to
know what I know about the treasure.
talk0022:
<sp:3:0:2:0101>My gut tells me this is the <clr:0000>spring high in
the heavens<clr:ffff>.<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0901>Except... <sp:5:0:0>I don't see the <clr:0000>rings of light <clr:ffff>that
the legend mentioned anywhere!<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_00>Hmmm. <sp:5:0:0>Could there be a <clr:0000>spring high in
the heavens<clr:ffff> somewhere other than here?<sp:0:4:0>I don't see how. We're standing at pretty
much the summit of Mount Lanayru.
What's higher than here?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01>I guess there's the <clr:0000>Skyview Towers<clr:ffff> and
such that you can see above.<sp:0:4:0>But where are these <clr:0000>rings of light <clr:ffff>I was
promised? <sp:5:0:0>And more to the point, where's
this <clr:0000>Light of Blessing<clr:ffff>?
talk0013:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_00>The truth is, by sheer luck I overheard
<clr:0000>a legend relating to the treasure <clr:ffff>on this
mountain while I was on my way here.<sp:0:4:0>I knew I was a genius for assuming there
was treasure on Mount Lanayru!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>Do you want to hear the legend too?<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0101>Great! <sp:5:0:0>Then listen up!<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Greeting_01>For I am Nazbi, <sp:5:1:0>the treasure hunter with
nothing to hide!
talk0023:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>Gotcha! <sp:5:0:0>Till we meet again, my kindred
spirit in risking life and limb for that
sweet, sweet treasure!
talk0024:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>You must be a fiend for treasure, asking
me about this again. <sp:5:1:0>That's fine!<sp:5:0:0> I love
talking about this stuff!
talk0025:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Greeting_01>I'm Nazbi! Does that answer all your
questions? <sp:5:1:0>Or did you want to hear the
<clr:0000>legend<clr:ffff> of this mountain?
talk0026:
<sp:3:0:2:0101>I suspect the <clr:0000>spring high in the heavens<clr:ffff> is
referring to these springs. <sp:5:0:0>The treasure
is as good as found!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad_00>All except for the "finding it" part.<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:4:0>I don't know what to do with the "<clr:0000>rings of
light<clr:ffff>" bit. <sp:5:0:0>I don't see anything like that
around here.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0901>But I won't give up! <sp:5:1:0>Because, you see...<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Greeting_01>I am Nazbi, the dauntless treasure
hunter!<sp:5:1:0> Not to be confused with my
noble steed, Dauntless.
talk0027:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Greeting_01>Hey there! <sp:5:1:0>I'm Nazbi, a treasure hunter
searching for a legendary haul!
talk0018:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>"Skim across snow, from the spring high
in the heavens to the mountain below.<sp:0:4:0>"Pass through the rings of light to see the
Light of Blessing."
talk0028:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Greeting_01>Hey there! <sp:5:1:0>I'm Nazbi, a treasure hunter
searching far and wide for the good stuff!
talk0019:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Happy_00>What do you think? <sp:5:0:0>That was the real
legend of a real treasure, passed down
on this very mountain!<sp:0:4:0>And you know that with a name like
<clr:0000>Light of Blessing<clr:ffff>, the treasure's gotta
be worth a bundle!
talk0029:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Greeting_00>You wanna know why I do this? <sp:5:0:0>The truth
is, it's all for my faithful steed!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0901>Turns out horses eat a lot. <sp:5:0:0>And being a
growing horse, mine eats more than most.<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad_00>My loyal steed has chewed right through
all my savings. <sp:5:0:0>I've gotta get rich quick.<sp:5:0:0>
And for that, I need treasure!
